items.sentence: We have plenty of time. There's no need to hurry.
It's too bad Tom couldn't attend today's meeting.
All of the money I had in this drawer is missing.
Tom didn't read the letter he received from Mary.
Tom isn't going to do that. At least, I hope not.
Tom left Mary a message on her answering machine.
Tom was sitting in the dark, smoking a cigarette.
Tom does some funny things every once in a while.
I told Tom that I didn't care about his problems.
Do you think Tom knows where Mary first met John?
